actionCalls.description: Send an email to the user when a range of checks type case is created.
actionCalls.name: SendEmailForRangeofChecksTypeCaseCreation
actionCalls.label: Send Email for Range of Checks Type Case Creation

value.stringValue: Your service request to Stop Check Payment was created

actionCalls.description: Send an email to the user when a single check type case is created.
actionCalls.name: SendEmailForSingleCheckTypeCaseCreation
actionCalls.label: Send Email for Single Check Type Case Creation

value.stringValue: Your service request to Stop Check Payment was created

assignments.description: Sets the values of the fields required to send an email.
assignments.name: AssignEmailPrerequisites
assignments.label: Assign Email Prerequisites

assignments.description: Assigns Account Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the AccountNumber variable.
assignments.name: SetAccountNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Amount from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Amount Text variable.
assignments.name: SetAmount
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Check Date from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the CheckDate Text variable.
assignments.name: SetCheckDate
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Check Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the CheckNumber Text variable.
assignments.name: SetCheckNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Check Type from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the CheckType Text variable.
assignments.name: SetCheckType
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Ending Check Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the EndingCheckNumber Text variable.
assignments.name: SetEndingCheckNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Payee from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Payee Text variable.
assignments.name: SetPayee
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Reason from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Reason Text variable.
assignments.name: SetReason
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Starting Check Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the StartingCheckNumber Text variable.
assignments.name: SetStartingCheckNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

constants.description: Stores the address of the header image used in the email template.
constants.name: HeaderImageURL

decisions.description: Determines whether the Check Type is 'Single' or 'Range'.
decisions.name: CheckTypeDecision
decisions.label: Check Type

decisions.description: Determines if the prerequisites to send an email are available or not.
decisions.name: HavePrerequisitesToSendAnEmail
decisions.label: Have Prerequisites To Send An Email?

decisions.description: Determines whether the email associated with the Account is available or not.
decisions.name: IsAccountEmailAvailable
decisions.label: Is Account Email Available?

decisions.description: Determines which attribute is stored in the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop.
decisions.name: SetWhichAttribute
decisions.label: Set Which Attribute?

Flow.description: Allows an agent to review the details of the stop check payment request.

formulas.description: Creates the account name by concatenating first name and last name.
formulas.name: AccountNameFormula

formulas.description: Adds a row for the amount in the email template.
formulas.name: AddAmountRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!Amount}<>'N/A' ,'Amount: '+''+{!Amount}+'
' ,' ')

formulas.description: Adds a row for the check date in the email template.
formulas.name: AddCheckDateRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!CheckDate}<>'N/A' ,'Check Date: '+''+{!CheckDate}+'
' ,' ')

formulas.description: Adds a row for the payee in the email template.
formulas.name: AddPayeeRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!Payee}<>'N/A' ,'Payee: '+''+{!Payee}+'
' ,' ')

Flow.label: Review Stop Check Payment

loops.description: Iterates through Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Values from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
loops.name: IterateThroughServiceCatalogRequests
loops.label: Iterate Through Service Catalog Requests

recordLookups.description: Gets the service catalog request extended attribute value records with a record Id matching the SvcCatalogRequestId that was passed into the flow. Stores the results in the Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Value collection variable.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
recordLookups.label: Get Service Catalog Request Extended Attributes

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email that’s sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBodyRangeofChecksType
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to stop check payment was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:
Check range starting number: {!StartingCheckNumber}
Check range ending number: {!EndingCheckNumber}
Reason: {!Reason}

Thank You,
Customer Support Team

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email that’s sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBodySingleCheckType
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to stop check payment was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:
Check Number: {!CheckNumber}
{!AddCheckDateRow} {!AddAmountRow} {!AddPayeeRow} Reason: {!Reason}

Thank You,
Customer Support Team

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Email of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AccountEmail

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Name of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AccountName

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Number of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: AccountNumber

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Account Number.
variables.name: AccountNumberAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of the Amount attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
variables.name: Amount

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Amount.
variables.name: AmountAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of Case Number of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: CaseNumber

variables.description: Stores the value of the Check Date attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: CheckDate

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Check Date.
variables.name: CheckDateAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of the Check Number attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: CheckNumber

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Check Number.
variables.name: CheckNumberAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of the Check Type attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: CheckType

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Check Type.
variables.name: CheckTypeAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of the Ending Check Number attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: EndingCheckNumber

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Ending Check Number.
variables.name: EndingCheckNumberAttribute

variables.description: Stores the SvcCatalogRequestId passed into the flow and is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: InputRecordId

variables.description: Stores the value of the Payee attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: Payee

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Payee.
variables.name: PayeeAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of Person Contact Id of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: PersonContactId

variables.description: Stores the value of the Reason attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: Reason

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Reason.
variables.name: ReasonAttribute

variables.description: Stores the value of the Starting Check Number attribute of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
variables.name: StartingCheckNumber

variables.description: Stores the attribute name for Starting Check Number.
variables.name: StartingCheckNumberAttribute
